name: df-reverse
body: |- wceq(creverse, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(s0), co(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s1))))))
comment: Define an operation which reverses the order of symbols in a word. This operation is also known as "word reversal" and "word mirroring". (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)
